p: The findings of Farag et al. [ 23] agreed quite well with the present data where pomegranate peels crude juice contained remarkable contents of total polyphenols and flavonoids, tannins and total anthocyanins being about 1.22, 1.43, 1.16 and 1.29 times as high as that in leaves juice, respectively. Russo et al. [ 29] demonstrated that total phenolic content of pomegranate peels (Wonderful variety) was 137.28 ± 1.19 mg GAE/g DW.
